sentences.en: A crowd of youths started smashing windows.
sentences.cn: 一群年轻人开始砸玻璃。

sentences.en: Bullets sang over the rooftops, a few striking and smashing the tiles.
sentences.cn: 时时有枪子在屋顶上飞过,“嗤嗤”地响着,一会儿这里的瓦破了, 一会儿那里的瓦又落了.

sentences.en: Hits the granulated substance ( smashing ) machine destroys one of ore enrichment plants.
sentences.cn: 打砂 ( 粉碎 ) 机是打碎矿石的选矿设备之一.

sentences.en: I need to talk to you about smashing those windows last night.
sentences.cn: 我得和你谈谈你昨晚打碎的那些玻璃.

sentences.en: It was smashing. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.cn: 真的很棒，我由衷地喜欢。

sentences.en: Jake has raised two smashing kids and I trust his judgement.
sentences.cn: 杰克养大了两个了不起的孩子，我相信他的判断。

sentences.en: Johnson's smashing victory in 1964 changed the political horizon substantially.
sentences.cn: 1964年约翰逊的大获成功给政界带来了翻天覆地的变化。

sentences.en: She took revenge on her ex-boyfriend by smashing up his home.
sentences.cn: 为了报复，她砸了前任男友的家。

sentences.en: Smashing windows was their way of showing their anger.
sentences.cn: 打碎窗玻璃就成为他们泄愤的方式.

sentences.en: They find it difficult to discount the smashing victory he finally attained in Tunisia.
sentences.cn: 他们发现很难对他最后在突尼西亚获得压倒的胜利打一点折扣的.

sentences.en: Tom keeps smashing neighbor's windows when he plays football in the alley.
sentences.cn: 汤坶在胡同里踢足球老是把邻居的窗子砸烂.

sentences.en: Two weeks ago I thought seriously of smashing your head in with a cobblestone.
sentences.cn: 两周前我都想拿石头砸碎你脑袋.
我们的假期过得非常棒。

sentences.en: While you are on the phone, the baby pulls the table - cloth off the table. smashing half your best crockery and cutting himself in the process.
sentences.cn: 你接电话时小孩把桌布扯了下来, 把你最好的陶器打碎了一半,同时他还把自己磕破了.

sentences.en: Winston had a hallucination of himself smashing a pick - axe right into the middle of it.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿不由得暗想,顶好朝那张蠢脸劈头来一斧,砸他个稀巴烂.
